biotools.summary:
FASTAFS is toolkit for file system virtualisation of random access compressed FASTA files.
Although it is uncommon, the FASTAFS format denotes the index (a typical header) after the data. The reason for this location is that most metadata can only be known after converting the entire FASTA file to FASTAFS. For instance, the number of nucleotides encoded within 2bit data, the number of N-characters or the checksum.
